title: Practical Project on Computer Networks and Data Communication

context.prior_knowledge: IP Addressing System, OSI 7-Layer Model, and Basic LAN/WAN Concepts
context.additional_context: Course focusing on strengthening network problem-solving competencies applicable in real-world tasks for office/administrative professionals. Learners conduct hands-on practice on personal devices and perform real-case-based projects through team collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with team members to derive problem-solving strategies during the design and configuration of network topologies.
Learners can identify causes of data transmission errors three or more times using packet analysis tools and write reports.
Learners can simulate real-world scenarios such as Wi-Fi interference and bandwidth limitations in a virtual environment and propose optimization solutions.

resources: Virtual Network Simulator (Cisco Packet Tracer, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
